ch0075_00_bikini/2702_1031_01_10:
A beautiful thing can
also be poisonous.
ch0075_00_bikini/2702_1031_02_10:
Ahh...
I wish I could feel them...
ch0075_00_bikini/2702_0701_01_10:
Mareanie’s got the most gorgeous tentacles...
It’s like an art piece!
ch0075_00_bikini/2702_0701_02_10:
But they’re poisonous, so when other Pokémon
touch them, they faint.
ch0075_00_bikini/2702_0701_05_10:
Even if your Pokémon is poisoned or paralyzed,
you can use items or moves to heal it!
ch0075_00_bikini/2702_0702_01_10: But you can’t heal Trainers with items or moves.
ch0075_00_bikini/2702_0702_02_10:
What if a Trainer were to become poisoned?
What would you do?!
ch0075_00_bikini/2703_1031_01_10:
I totally know how
you feel.
ch0075_00_bikini/2703_1031_02_10:
It’s important to have a
place to relax...
ch0075_00_bikini/2703_1031_03_10:
Same goes for Trainers
and Pokémon...
ch0075_00_bikini/2703_0701_01_10: Try to really understand your Pokémon.
ch0075_00_bikini/2703_0701_02_10:
For example, Pokémon that have excellent
Water-type moves can use those moves
even in deserts or forests.
ch0075_00_bikini/2703_0701_03_10:
But Pokémon that like water are happiest
when they’re close to water.
ch0075_00_bikini/2703_0701_04_10:
You have your favorite spot, right?
So do Pokémon!
ch0075_00_bikini/2703_0702_02_10:
Even after an exhausting adventure,
once you come home, you feel restored.
ch0075_00_bikini/2704_1031_03_10:
I should scout some
sync pairs.
ch0075_00_bikini/2704_0701_01_10:
When I feel lonely, I like making new friends to
go on adventures with.
ch0075_00_bikini/2704_0701_02_10:
You seem a bit lonely, so I’ll let you in on
a little secret.
ch0075_00_bikini/2704_0701_03_10:
If you go to the Pokémon Center shop,
you might find friends there!
ch0075_00_bikini/2704_0701_04_10: Not that I’m asking you to be my friend, but...
ch0075_00_bikini/2704_0702_01_10:
I hope you get to meet lots of new people
as you travel.
ch0075_00_bikini/2704_0702_02_10:
If I happen to be one of them... *cough*
Oh, nothing... Never mind.
ch0075_00_bikini/2751_1031_01_10:
What’s he doing with
that Poké Ball?
ch0075_00_bikini/2751_1031_02_10:
Does he not know how
things work on Pasio?
ch0075_00_bikini/2751_1032_02_10:
Maybe it doesn’t like the
way I throw my Poké Ball.
ch0075_00_bikini/2751_1032_03_10: Do I need to try harder?
ch0075_00_bikini/2751_0701_01_10:
Dude, every time I try to catch a Pokémon,
people interfere with me.
ch0075_00_bikini/2751_0701_02_10:
Um, you’re not serious, are you?
This joke’s gone on long enough, bro.
ch0075_00_bikini/2751_0701_03_10:
What? Come on, don’t say that.
Gimme some advice!
ch0075_00_bikini/2751_0701_04_10:
To begin with, there are no
wild Pokémon on Pasio.
ch0075_00_bikini/2751_0701_06_10:
How have you not noticed that?
All of the Pokémon are with Trainers.
